system.description:
If the victim is above 5th level, the thiefâ€™s roll is penalised by 5% for every level above 5th. There is always at least a 1% chance of failure. A roll of more than twice the percentage required for success means that the attempted theft is noticed. The referee should determine the reaction of the victim (possibly using the @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.u9gtXY21VnjrwwkH.JournalEntryPage.SAZiydZewI4XOlsU#monster-reaction-roll]{monster reaction roll table}.)
